definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: As for Saul, he made havock of the church, entering into every house, and haling men and women committed them to prison.
sentences.chinese: 扫罗却残害教会，进各人的家，拉着男女下在监里。

sentences.english: And their mutual injury is the meandrous and intense reflection of their attachment consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 女性间的自相残害是依附意识的曲折和激烈的反映。

sentences.english: 3But Saul began to destroy the church. Going from house to house, he dragged off men and women and put them in prison.
sentences.chinese: 扫罗却残害教会，进各人的家，拉着男女下在监里。

sentences.english: Woe be unto the pastors that destroy and scatter the sheep of my pasture! saith the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华说，那些残害，赶散我草场之羊的牧人有祸了。
汽车尾气像吸血鬼残害我们生命。

sentences.english: But Saul was ravaging the church by entering house after house, dragging off both men and women,he committed them to prison.
sentences.chinese: 扫罗却残害教会，进各人的家，拉着男女下在监里。

sentences.english: What we call protecting our country is destroying lives.
sentences.chinese: 我们所谓保卫国家，实际上是在残害生命。

sentences.english: China's law clearly forbids the drowning of infants and other acts of killing them.
sentences.chinese: 中国法律明确规定，禁止溺婴和其他残害婴儿的行为。

sentences.english: Women do not need to cripple the next generation with these evil thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 妇女不需要拿这些恶毒的思想来残害下一代。

definition: to poison (harm with a toxic substance)/to poison (people's minds)/poisoning
violent death (idiom); to die in a disaster/an unnatural death
